description: The Huawei MateBook X Pro is our pick for the best laptop money can buy in 2018. This is a gorgeously-designed laptop with a stunning screen (albeit with a rather odd aspect ratio), and it comes packed with cutting edge components that allows it to perform brilliantly, and a battery life that runs rings around many of its rivals. It also has a very competitive price, giving you features, design and performance for quite a bit less money.

If you're after the latest and greatest laptop from Apple, we suggest you look into the 2018 model of the 15-inch MacBook Pro with Touch Bar. The headline Touch Bar – a thin OLED display at the top of the keyboard which can be used for any number of things, whether that be auto-suggesting words as you type or offering Touch ID so you can log in with just your fingerprint – is of course included. It's certainly retained Apple's sense of style, but it comes at a cost. This is a pricey machine, so you may want to consider one of the Windows alternatives. But, if you're a steadfast Apple diehard, this is definitely the best laptop for you!

The Dell XPS 13 is an absolutely brilliant laptop. The 2018 version rocks an 8th-generation Intel Core i5 or i7 processor and a bezel-less ‘Infinity Edge’ display, this Dell XPS 13 continues to be the most popular Windows laptop in the world. What’s more, there’s a wide range of customization options, so you can really make the Dell XPS 13 the best laptop for your needs.

Asus has struck gold with its new refresh of its ZenBook Flip S 2-in-1 laptop. With a new Kaby Lake R 8th-generation processor powering the device, plenty of RAM and a super-fast PCIe SSD in certain models, this is an absolutely stunning laptop. Its 2-in-1 design means you can use it as both a laptop and a tablet, and while it's not as affordable as some other machines, if you have the budget you'll be really happy with this fantastic device.

While it may not have the best keyboard in the world, the Samsung Notebook 9 is still one of the best laptops you can buy in 2018. Packed with more horsepower than some MacBook Pros,but at a much lower price, Samsung has crafted a laptop that has just as much substance as it does style. Plus, on top of its killer specs, it’s lightweight and thin, making this one of the most portable 15-inch laptops you can buy today.

The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 brings improved performance with the latest AMD Ryzen processors while maintaining its sleek design and excellent build quality. With a vibrant display and comfortable keyboard, it's an ideal choice for productivity and everyday use.

The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 9 is a powerhouse business laptop with a lightweight and durable design. Featuring a stunning 4K display, powerful performance, and an excellent keyboard, it's the perfect choice for professionals on the go.

The HP Spectre x360 14 is a versatile 2-in-1 laptop with a stunning OLED display and exceptional performance. With its sleek design, long battery life, and convertible form factor, it's perfect for both work and entertainment.

The Acer Swift 5 is an ultraportable laptop with a powerful 11th gen Intel Core processor and a lightweight design. With its long battery life and vibrant display, it's perfect for productivity on the go.

The Razer Blade 15 is a powerful gaming laptop with a sleek design and high-refresh-rate display. With its premium build quality and powerful specs, it's perfect for gamers and content creators alike.

The Alienware m15 R6 is a high-performance gaming laptop with cutting-edge hardware and a stunning display. With its powerful specs and customizable RGB lighting, it's the ultimate gaming machine for enthusiasts.

The MSI GS66 Stealth is a premium gaming laptop with a sleek design and powerful hardware. With its high-refresh-rate display and advanced cooling system, it's perfect for hardcore gamers who demand the best performance.

The Gigabyte Aero 15 OLED is a premium laptop with a stunning 4K OLED display and powerful hardware. With its sleek design and long battery life, it's perfect for content creators and professionals who demand the best.

The LG Gram 17 is an ultraportable laptop with a large 17-inch display and long battery life. With its lightweight design and powerful hardware, it's perfect for professionals who need a large screen for productivity on the go.

The Lenovo Legion 7i is a premium gaming laptop with a sleek design and powerful hardware. With its high-refresh-rate display and advanced cooling system, it's perfect for gamers who demand the best performance.
